name: King's Quest V - Absence Makes the Heart Go Yonder! [NES]
description:
King's Quest 5: Absence Makes the Heart Go Yonder is an adventure game developed by Sierra On-Line. It was originally released in 1990. Sierra On-Line published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
You can play King's Quest 5: Absence Makes the Heart Go Yonder on PC.
